nodes.name: listItem
delistItem
purchaseItem

nodes.documentation:
Get an array of all the currently active items in the incentive network
@return _itemIDs uint[]: array of all items currently marked active*
nodes.name: getActiveItems
itemProfile
listItem
delistItem
purchaseItem

nodes.documentation:
Get an array of all the currently active items in the incentive network
@return _itemIDs uint[]: array of all items currently marked active*
nodes.name: getActiveItems
itemProfile

delistItem(uint256).details: modifier onlyCron Permanently retire an item from the shop

params._itemID: uint: the itemID of the Item being toggled as inactive*

returns._active: bool: true if the item is open for interaction and false if it is permanently locked
returns._cost: uint: the number of MUBC tokens that are burned from the user's account upon purchase
returns._description: string: the description of the item and it's properties/ entitlements if bought
returns._purchasers: uint[]: array of userIDs that purchased this item*
returns._quantity: uint: the number of times this item can be purchased.

listItem(string,uint256,uint256).details: modifier onlyCron List a new item on the MUBC shop

params._cost: uint: how many incentive tokens must be burned to purchase this item
params._description: string: a short description of the item being offered for purchase
params._quantity: uint: number of times this item can be purchased.

returns._itemID: uint: the itemSerial given to the newly listed item*

purchaseItem(uint256,uint256).details: modifier onlyCron Spend MUBC tokens to purchase an item. Items should not be purchasable twice.

params._as: uint: userID of the user purchasing the item*
params._itemID: uint: the itemID of the item being purchased

getActiveItems().notice: Get an array of all the currently active items in the incentive network

itemProfile(uint256).notice: Return the data associated with an item
